A young boy asks for Holmes' help in finding his missing father.
While walking along the banks of the River Thames, Watson finds a diamond tooth.

After more than a year apart, two former partners reunite with a pact to avoid the topic that once divided them, hoping that focusing on companionship alone will keep their fragile bond steady. again.
Beryl and Geoffrey reunite after a long split, but an unsettling moment makes Beryl crave a more dominant Geoffrey, and his uneasy efforts strain their fragile peace.
Duffy and Sharon's engagement is made official at last - so, of course, there has to be a party. What better time than now for the happy couple to have all their old school friends around them?
Duffy and Sharon are engaged and looking for a home of their own. They think they've found one but Frankie loses them the chance to buy it. Full of remorse, he sets out to try to make amends.
Madness, The Sweet & Slade. Alex Dyke presents an hour of bubblegum pop and cheesy tracks to make you feel good.
On his way to the bank, Bloody Delilah spots the deserted Thunderbird 3 and finds the lads having a tea break in a nearby garden.
Cheese and Egg says he knows a mate who wants them to smuggle 5,000 duty-free cigarettes past the customs for twenty quid. Chaos ensues.
That's My Dog, game show hosted by Derek Hobson where dogs and their owners compete for money and prizes.
While holidaying in England, Sharron is recruited by an organisation doing research into superior physical and mental powers.
Ken becomes involved with the fire service once again as he tracks down a fireman-turned-arsonist, and Harry hosts a Success Through Confidence course at the Plaza Suite.

programmes.show_name: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programmes.show_description: Graceless, unkempt Mary is the opposite of the girls Miss Brodie cultivates. Nevertheless, when Miss Brodie learns about Mary, she decides to take her under her wing.
Jasper Carrott stars as Sago, holidaying in Spain with friends Wayne and Kevin. After losing their money in a backgammon game, he enters them in a talent contest to win it back.
Shirley Temple stars as Sara Crewe, sent to boarding school by her father, Captain Crewe. After he's reported killed in the Boer War, she's mistreated and clings to hope he's still alive.
Alex Dyke learns about another popular car from our past when he visits the National Motor Museum at Beaulieu.

programmes.show_name: The Man Who Made Husbands Jealous
programmes.show_description: The steamy classic from Rivals author Jilly Cooper. Broke and infamous, Lysander Hawkley turns tabloid notoriety into seducing wronged wives.

programmes.show_description: The famous ballerina Anna Pavlova is coming to Edinburgh. Miss Brodie insists that her girls experience this important cultural event.
The story of Madeleine Smith, a respectable spinster who was accused of killing her lover in 19th-century Edinburgh. The case was famously found to be "not proven".

A plague called the Purple Death is sweeping across Earth. Ming the Merciless is behind the plague, using spaceships to spread Death Dust in the Earths atmosphere.
The story of Dr. Crippen, who killed his nymphomaniac wife Belle Elmore for the love of a young woman named Ethel Le Neve
Gyles Brandreth and Michele Brown explore stunning public gardens across South West England in this fun, informative series-perfect for beginners and expert gardeners alike.
Jack Hargreaves goes fishing for plaice in Poole Harbour. He then heads to Cumbria, one of the only places in Britain where harness racing takes place.

Jane is struggling to balance her job as an agony aunt with her failing marriage.
The Junior Gazette is taken over by the formidable Lynda Day, who immediately clashes with the papers existing staff.
Three men find themselves in an atomic test area with a bomb due to go off at any time - if it does, it will destroy much of Australia.
After a major mission succeeds, the team faces a rescue crisis. Loyalties, grief, and impossible choices test everyone as they struggle to escape increasing danger.
Stuart Ball delivers rapid-fire takes on forgotten TV gems and retro nostalgia.
